aws.description: AWS MCP Server for S3, Lambda, EC2, and other AWS service management

s3.description: S3 bucket management and file operations

setup_instructions: 1. Install AWS CLI and configure credentials: aws configure
2. Set environment variables: AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID, AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY, AWS_REGION
4. Add this config to your project's .claude/settings.json under mcpServers
